general.title: Vampire Party
error: Oops! Something went wrong. It's probably your fault. Don't blame this on me!

waitingRoom.title: Party Lobby
waitingRoom.waitingForPlayers: You need {playersNeeded} more player{pluralize} to start the game
waitingRoom.readyToStart: {vipPlayer} can start the game when everyone has joined

exitModal.waitingRoomPlayersInGame: Leaving now will end the game for everyone.  I know {randomPlayer} is gonna be super sad

firstNight.title: Night
firstNight.content: Hello and welcome. I hope your beds are comfortable and your doors are locked. Because there are 2 Vampires afoot, and they are huuuuuungry. Vampires are not the only ones who are active at night though, so pay attention to your screen for any prompts. Hope to see you all in the AM!

night.title: Night
night.content: It is night time... the beasts are about... they will choose their pray. There is little that can help you now... Look at your phone even if you are not the vampire... if you act quick enough maybe you can avoid death...
